QuestData.Title: Locating the Longshot
QuestData.Description: We're going to need a bigger gun if we hope to free Xe'ra.$b$bOne of the other bunkers crashed closer to the Xenedar. If Baraat was on it, he will have already begun surveying the area. Perhaps he's found the main cannon of the ship.$b$bIf you head over that way, make sure he hasn't died, will you?
QuestData.RewardText: We're under too much pressure here. And it's so close to us...
